CreateFolder.RegisterView: This interface is the entry point for all documents into the system, so you must ensure the consistency of data entered in this part. The registered files will be subject to multiple treatments through the various departments of your structure.
CreateFolder.FillForm: Fill out the form below to register a
CreateFolder.FileSelection: After selecting the type of folder, view its characteristics on the right of your screen

CreateFolder.DescriptionDossier: Enter the description of the contents of the folder
CreateFolder.PlaceholderDescription: Please write a precise description of the contents of this folder
CreateFolder.UserEmailAddr: Enter the email address of the concerned user
CreateFolder.NoteUserEmailAddr: You must enter the email address which this user has choose when creating his account, so we can automatically generate a code allowing him to follow the progress of the folder thus created.
CreateFolder.AssociatedFolders: To this type of folder is associated
CreateFolder.InfoFileSize: The maximum size of attachment(s) associated with this type of folder
CreateFolder.AssociatedFiles: Files to be associated with the type of folder chosen:
